It is most famous for its variety of birds.

It is not exactly convinient to get to Souss-Massa by public transport.
The most accessible entrance is from Massa. Take bus 60 from Innezgane (see

, 20 Dh) until the end, which is just a little further than the grand taxi station (25 Dh to Agadir). The entry is about 5km from the bus stop, just continue the road until a sign leads you to a non-sealed road close by the river.
There is very little traffic, donâ€™t rely on getting a lift there.
From the entry it is about 3km to the river mouth and the dunes.

Walking on feet, entry is free of charge.
Guides are available at the entrance.
